desc: home town | modern nostalgia mixes old and new through curated home decor and furniture with refined, yet laid back style. Featuring hand-picked European antiques, luxe Italian linens, on-trend decor, and handcrafted modern furniture, home town has everything you’ll need to create a well-loved home.

layout.text: this 4th of july weekend and get rewarded with 15% off $200 or more!
